EmailTemplate.name: 02-10-22 DBNK D3 Campaign Email 2.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: 6 Digital Banking Transformation Trends for 2022
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Financial institutions everywhere are working to future-proof their digital banking. And there’s greater urgency than ever to transform faster to remain competitive. But it’s critical to first understand the changing landscape of financial services. As you drive your digital transformation efforts forward, discover the six trends experts say are affecting banks and credit unions in 2022. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
